welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cizre, Turkey! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Cizre has to offer.

restaurants.name: Çamlıca et lokantası

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sirnak Serafettin Elci Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
